item.description:
Learn all about 5s and strengths and defenses. Learn about all the subtypes of 5, personal growth strategies, relationship dynamics in relationship to 5s. Fine to come if you are in relationship to a 5.

7:00 pm - 9:30 pm

Cost: $40 - Sliding scale to $20

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, has taught a number of workshops on assertiveness and living your authentic life. He is a leading expert in the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram (which you can purchase from him), is a therapist for individuals, couples, and families who specializes in enhancing relationship satisfaction through understanding and better communication regarding personality differences. He does phone sessions and leads trainings for groups, organizations and companies.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Type 5, Knowledge Seeker, Workshop - also, How to Relate to 5s
